story.title: Our Story
story.part1: Since 2010, Elite Schnauzers has been dedicated to breeding exceptional miniature schnauzers. Our journey began with a deep love for the breed and a commitment to maintaining its highest standards.
story.part2: We take pride in our breeding program that focuses on health, temperament, and conformity to breed standards. Each puppy is raised in our home with love and attention to ensure proper socialization.

health.title: Health First
health.description: We prioritize the health of our dogs through rigorous genetic testing and veterinary care.
